front.title: A Profile for Resource Certificate Repository Structure

abstract.t: This document defines a profile for the structure of repository publication points that contain X.509 / PKIX Resource Certificates, Certificate Revocation Lists and signed objects. This profile contains the proposed object naming scheme, the contents of repository publication points, the contents of publication point manifests and a suggested internal structure of a local repository cache that is intended to facilitate synchronisation across a distributed collection of repository publication points and facilitate certification path construction.
